tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor started with a friendly note as if he knew us. Half the problem was gone. He listened calmly,  got our diagnosis reports early and was ready. He even called us for video and the discussions were simple. The relaxed sweet tone of him soothened our hypertension. His prescriptions looks satisfactory to us. We strongly reccomend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Good. He diagnoised and suggested treatment required for my health condition and referred a general surgeon for further treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is very humble and friendly 
Explains well about medication to be followed,  diet and physical exercise

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've been visited many doctors in the past but haven't seen anyone looking at issue such in detail and hearing out patiently and clearly articulated in prescription.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr is very friendly and he explains well. He suggested how to maintain diet during treatment.
Thank u

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor clarified my questions with patience. Clearly explained about the issues in my medical check up report.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I went with a problem related to hairfall due to thyroid, however he was not the right doctor for my problem, he was very kind and patient and suggested me the right specialist for my issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He has got good patience and listens every problem. And being a senior consultant treatment also good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am really impressed the way Dr. Jai Simha listens the problem, the treatment was good and waiting time also appreciable. I surely recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Good experience found the solution, friendly contact and explanation 
Good environment 
Surely  I recommend to onother people
